verses.roman:
govinda kahe,--'karite cāhi pāda-samvāhana'
prabhu kahe,--'kara vā nā kara, yei laya tomāra mana'

synonyms: govinda kahe—Govinda said; karite—to do; cāhi—I want; pāda-samvāhana—massaging Your legs; prabhu kahe—the Lord replied; kara—do; vā—or; nā kara—do not do; yei—whatever; laya tomāra mana—you decide.
translation: Govinda repeatedly requested, "I want to massage Your legs," but the Lord said, "Do it or don't do it. It depends upon your mind."
